title: Information Transmission in a Social Network: Dissecting the Spread of a Quora Post
description:
tl;dr See this movie visualization for a case study on how a post propagates through Quora.

How does information spread through a network? Much of Quora’s appeal, after all, lies in its social graph – and when you’ve got a network of users, all broadcasting their activities to â€¦
dc:creator: Edwin Chen
